column1: Added leather, studded, chainmail, and iron armor, quiver, apple, shovel, and sword.
Added flint and steel, axes, pickaxes, and bows.
Added coal, diamond, gold ingot, iron ingot, and new wooden, stone and diamond swords, axes, pickaxes and shovels variants.
Added golden swords, axes, pickaxes, and shovels; bowl, mushroom stew, gunpowder, string, and feather.
Added bread, hoes, seeds, and wheat.
Studded Armor was removed between Indev 0.31 20100204-1 and Indev 20100206.
Added flint, raw porkchop, and cooked porkchop.
Added bucket, water bucket, and lava bucket.
Added paper, book, clay ball, brick, and slimeball.
Added eggs, 2 new music discs, minecart with furnace, and minecart with chest.
Added clock, glowstone dust, cooked cod, and raw cod.
Added bone, bone meal, lapis lazuli, cocoa beans, ink sac, charcoal, dyes, and sugar.
Added raw chicken, cooked chicken, raw beef, steak, ender pearls, melon seeds, melon slice, pumpkin seeds, and rotten flesh.
Added blaze rod, ghast tear, gold nugget, and nether wart.
Added blaze powder, fermented spider eye, glass bottle, magma cream, 9 new music disc, and spider eye.
Added glistering melon slice, ghast tear, potions, and splash potions.
Added bottle o' enchanting, fire charge, and ocelot spawn egg.
Added book and quill and written book.
Added emerald and enchanted golden apple.
Added potion and splash potion of night vision.
Added carrot, golden carrot, potato, baked potato, poisonous potato, item frame and potion and splash potion of invisibility.

Added enchanted book, firework rocket, and firework star.
Added nether brick and nether quartz.

Added clownfish, raw salmon, cooked salmon, pufferfish, and potion and splash potion of water breathing.
Added prismarine crystals, prismarine shard, and guardian spawn egg.
Added raw mutton, cooked mutton, raw rabbit, cooked rabbit, potion and splash potion of leaping, rabbit's foot, rabbit hide, rabbit spawn egg, and rabbit stew.

Added spectral arrow, 14 new tipped arrows, beetroot, beetroot seeds, beetroot soup, chorus fruit, popped chorus fruit, shulker spawn egg, splash water bottles, mundane, thick, and awkward splash potions.
Added dragon's breath and lingering potions.
Added potion of luck and uncraftable potion.
Added 10 new types of spawn eggs.
Added llama, evoker, vex, and vindicator spawn eggs, shulker shell, totem of undying, and explorer map.
Added knowledge book and parrot spawn egg.
Added bark, mushroom blocks, mushroom stem, petrified oak slab, smooth quartz, smooth red sandstone, smooth sandstone, smooth stone, and debug stick.
Added trident weapon, kelp, dried kelp, scute, turtle shell, potion of the turtle master, arrow of the turtle master, turtle and phantom spawn eggs.
Added 3 fish buckets and spawn eggs for cod, salmon, and pufferfish.
Added spawn egg and bucket of tropical fish, and buried treasure exploration map.
Added phantom membrane, potion and arrow of slow falling.
Added heart of the sea and nautilus shell.
Added 4 banner patterns, crossbow, 4 new dyes, illager beast, panda, and pillager spawn eggs, and suspicious stew.
Added wandering trader and trader llama spawn eggs.
Added honey bottle, honeycomb, and bee spawn egg.
Added netherite armor, axe, shovel, pickaxe, and sword, netherite ingot, netherite scrap, and hoglin spawn egg.

Added amethyst shard, bundle, copper ingot, and spyglass.
Added axolotl spawn egg and bucket of axolotl.

Added raw copper, raw iron, and raw gold.
Added frog and tadpole spawn egg, bucket of tadpole and mangrove boat.
Added 7 types of boat with chest.

Added music disc 5 and disc fragment.
Added bamboo raft, bamboo raft with chest, and camel spawn egg.
Added iron golem, snow golem, ender dragon, and wither spawn egg.
Added cherry boat and boat with chest; 4 types of pottery shard, sniffer spawn egg, torchflower seeds and brush.
Added pitcher pod, 16 pottery shards, and 5 smithing templates.

Added shears, melon, melon seeds, pumpkin seeds, raw beef, steak, raw chicken, cooked chicken, rotten flesh, ender pearls, 10 music discs and chain armor.

Added carrot, golden carrot, carrot on a stick, nether star, potato, baked potato, poisonous potato, pumpkin pie, music disc “wait”, enchanted book, firework rocket, firework star, and potion and splash potion of invisibility and night vision.

Added raw rabbit, cooked rabbit, rabbit stew, raw mutton, cooked mutton, rabbit's foot, rabbit hide, potion of leaping, blue orchid, allium, azure bluet, tulips, oxeye daisy, sunflower, lilac, poppy, rose bush, peony, prismarine crystals, prismarine shard and spawn eggs for rabbits, endermites and guardians.

Added explorer map, totem of undying, iron nugget,  and spawn eggs for llamas, evokers, vindicators and vexes.
Added compounds, bleach, ice bombs, super fertilizer, medicine, sparklers and glow sticks.
Added trident, dried kelp, 4 buckets of fish, heart of the seas, nautilus shells and spawn eggs for drowned, dolphin and 4 types of fish.
Added turtle shells, scutes, phantom membranes, turtle master and slow falling potion and their splash, lingering and tipped arrow variants and spawn eggs for turtles, phantoms and agents.
Added crossbows, 4 colors of dye and spawn eggs for cats and pandas.
Added 6 banner patterns, sweet berries, shields and spawn eggs for pillagers, wandering traders and ravagers.
Added suspicious stew, honeycomb, honey bottles and spawn eggs for foxes and bees.

Added netherite armor, tools, ingot and scrap, piglin banner pattern, pigstep music disc, warped fungus on a stick, powder snow bucket, copper ingot, glow ink sac, glow berries, bucket of axolotl, amethyst shard, raw metal, spyglass, slowness iv potions and spawn eggs for hoglins, piglins, striders, zoglins, piglin brutes, goats, glow squids and axolotls.
Added all items from and prior to Bedrock Edition 1.12.0.
Added spawn eggs for cluckshroom and moobloom.
Added glowstone dust, and melon seeds.
Added all items from and prior to Bedrock Edition 1.14.0.
Added netherite armor, tools, ingot and scrap, piglin banner pattern, pigstep music disc, warped fungus on a stick, slowness iv potions, and spawn eggs for hoglins, piglins, striders, and zoglins.
Added baby crossbows, battlestaff, battlestaff of terror, corrupted seeds, dual crossbows, growing staff, and spellbound crossbows.
Arrows were added as an object and were fired by pressing Tab ↹.
Added the inventory, and with it, the first "non-tile" items.
Notch was hard at work making items and the inventory fully functional.[1][2]
Because the crafting system did not exist at this point, items were automatically added to the inventory after creating a new world.[3]
Apples were added, but they currently serve no function.
Can now place blocks on resource items
Can now drop a whole stack of items instead of just one at a time.
Right-clicking drops one of a stack.
Stackable items now stack outside inventory when thrown to the ground individually.
All items are now models, some are still generated from item icons.
Resource packs can make models for all items.
Items can be "tagged" with an ID.
Lighting of blocks in the inventory has been swapped from being dark on the right to being dark on the left.
Lighting of blocks in the inventory is once again darker on the right, as it was before 19w39a.
Dropped items now turn into a 3D model and spin.
Added ankle monitors, reality vision glasses and the smarter watch.
Added the 3D item and the blue, red, and yellow keys.
Added the very fine item and the footprints.

Added the Bottle of entity and their splash variations, bottle of void, potion of Big and Small and their splash, lingering, and arrow variations, la baguette, le tricolore, 17 tag items, new thing banner pattern, dupe hack, and longer string.
